1: 'jig pa <mistake>med//rdzogs</mistake> pa'i gnas <mistake>skabas</mistake> son pa'i <mistake>sems//kun</mistake> nas rab tu rdzogs <mistake>pa'o//chags</mistake> bral dang po <mistake>chogs</mistake> pa <mistake>the//rdo</mistake> rje lus med mi 'gyur <mistake>che//yongs</mistake> su rdzogs pa phyogs
2: gnyis <mistake>kyi// bag</mistake> chags rnams kyis ma 'khyud <mistake>pa'o//ji</mistake> ltar chu <mistake>bo'i</mistake> chu zhugs <mistake>pa//de</mistake> ni rgya mtshor chur mtshungs <mistake>pa//de</mistake> bzhin dngos <mistake>po'i</mistake> tshogs <mistake>'ad</mistake> <mistake>de//'gyur</mistake> pa med par 'gyur med <mistake>mtshudg</mistake>
3: ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa <mistake>'dis//zos</mistake> pa las ni <mistake>ronyid</mistake> <mistake>'gyur//sa</mistake> bon rang bzhin sa bon <mistake>gyis//'bras</mistake> <mistake>bu'i</mistake> dus <mistake>sung</mistake> rgyal <mistake>spangs//de</mistake> ltar dngos <mistake>po'i</mistake> tshogs pa <mistake>yad//mchog</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> mi
4: 'gyur zos pa <mistake>yis //mchog</mistake> tu mi 'gyur ba <mistake>nyid</mistake> <mistake>'gyur//rnam</mistake> pa thams cad rang bzhin <mistake>'dzin //mche</mistake> ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal <mistake>ni //dug</mistake> rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa <mistake>na//rma</mistake> la rig min
5: gzhan du <mistake>mi//yul</mistake> dang dbang <mistake>po'i</mistake> sgo rnams <mistake>kyis//de</mistake> bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i <mistake>bde// sems</mistake> rdzogs char gyur na rdo <mistake>rje//nor</mistake> bur rig min gzhan du <mistake>min//ul</mistake> rnams dbang <mistake>po'i</mistake> sgo
6: rnams <mistake>kyis//ji</mistake> ltar ro <mistake>chan</mistake> lcags rnams kyi // phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa <mistake>ni//lcags</mistake> la drag <mistake>po'i</mistake> mes gdungs <mistake>na//kun</mistake> nas kun <mistake>tu</mistake> 'bigs par <mistake>byed//de</mistake> bzhin nyid du 'gyur
7: med <mistake>ba de//phyogs</mistake> gcig yang dag gnas pa <mistake>yang// sems</mistake> la 'dod pa'i mes gdungs <mistake>na//kun</mistake> nas kun tu 'bigs par <mistake>byed// ji</mistake> ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams <mistake>ni//'ga'</mistake> zhig tu
8: yang <mistake>drim</mistake> <mistake>med//de</mistake> bzhin du ni phug pa'i <mistake>sems//'ga'</mistake> zhig tu yang bag chags <mistake>med//lcags</mistake> ni gser nyid du gyur <mistake>ba // me</mistake> yis dri ma med par <mistake>'gyur// de</mistake> bzhin yang dang yang du <mistake>sems//</mistake>
